ingredients: Ice cubes (optional, for a chilled shake)
instructions: Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh.
Add avocado flesh, milk, and Greek yogurt to a blender.
Add honey or agave syrup for sweetness.
Add ice cubes if desired and blend again.
Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately.
nutritional_benefits: Rich in healthy monounsaturated fats from avocado.
Good source of potassium and fiber.
Natural sweetness with honey or agave syrup.
